heading: HR00241
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE CONGRESSIONAL COMMITTEE ON THE WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE EFFECTIVENESS OF REPUBLIC ACT 9344 AS AMENDED BY REPUBLIC ACT 10630, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE JUVENILE JUSTICE AND WELFARE ACT, AND ITS IMPACT ON CHILDREN IF THE MINIMUM AGE OF CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY IS LOWERED
